name: The Great Sea Battle
storyline:
In this three-dimensional computer game, as in a traditional Naval battle, you can feel like a real admiral, under whom there is a squadron of 10 ancient ships. With their help, you need to destroy the enemy's fleet by guessing the locations of its ships on a hidden combat map.

The battlefield is completely three-dimensional, tilts and unfolds at any angle, and all visual and sound special effects are made as realistic as possible. If the enemy ship is damaged, you will see a blazing fire in the corresponding square of the field, and when the ship is completely engulfed in fire, it becomes visible and goes under water.

This turn-based shooting game with logic elements will be interesting for players of all generations. There are many colorful sea battles ahead of you, in which only a real sea wolf will be able to win.
summary: The Great Naval Battle is a traditional naval combat strategy that probably everyone knows, but in a 3D computer format.
